name: Future Troubles
description:
Image by CityGypsy11 on flickr

I made this game for a two game jams running at the same time, Scriptline Jam and Void Jam 2.0.  When I realized just how close the deadlines were becoming I elected to upload the introduction/tutorial, which has all the original concept game elements fully operational.

At the moment, there are only two non-player characters, two items and 2 locations implemented.  Future goals include:

  • Adding more locations to explore
  • Adding more characters to interact with
  • Adding events for characters
  • Adding more items
  • Increasing the cost and consequence of items
